Description:
A text that suggests to the player that they activate a bioscan connected to a checkpoint, in order to open up that checkpoint so that the team can move forward.
{0} is a door type. For example Bulkhead Door or Security Door.

French.Translation: Activer l'analyse de point de contrôle et ouvrir {0}

Spanish.Translation: Activar el escáner del punto de control y abrir {0}.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Ative o escâner de ponto de controle e abra {0}

Polish.Translation: Aktywuj skaner punktu kontrolnego i otwórz {0}

Japanese.Translation: チェックポイントスキャンを起動して {0}を開け

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 啟用重生點掃描並開啟{0}

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 激活重生点扫描并打开{0}

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.SecurityDoor.ActivateCheckpointAndOpen_X
